title: Hotwire: HTML Over The Wire
dot:
digraph Hotwire{node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue]; Hotwire[label="Hotwire
Alternative to building web apps
- Sends HTML instead of JSON
- Fast first-load pages
- Server-side rendering
- Simpler development experience
- No JavaScript required", shape=rect, fillcolor=lightgreen];Turbo[label="Turbo
- Speeds up page changes
- Form submissions
- Components
- Partial updates via WebSocket
- No JavaScript needed", shape=rect]; Stimulus[label="Stimulus
- HTML-centric approach
- Handles custom code
- Complements Turbo", shape=rect]; Native[label="Hotwire Native
- Web-first framework
- Build native mobile apps
- Leverage web app tools", shape=rect]; Hotwire->Turbo;Hotwire->Stimulus;Hotwire->Native;}
